description: This file defines a ViewBinding class for the fragment_notes_list.xml layout, providing a minimal surrogate to access UI components like RecyclerView, FloatingActionButton, and TextInputEditText in the Android app.

classes.name: FragmentNotesListBinding
classes.description: A minimal ViewBinding class providing references to key views in fragment_notes_list.xml layout.

methods.name: inflate
methods.description: Companion object method to instantiate the binding by inflating the layout and initializing view references.
